reviewsJson.markdown:
*note: there is TFA Honeydew I and II out there, this might be the II version. I will report back.*

##**Main Notes:**##

TFA Honeydew is very sweet, fruity and fresh. It's not a spot on, realistic honeydew; more of a candy-like version. 

##**Developement:**##

At 2% it is thin, more fresh and watery. The background notes come to the front after a short steep.

At 5% you got yourself a really bold honeydew flavor. At =<5% it seems to hit the sweet spot, giving you a very clear flavor profile.

At 10% it started off very strong - the sweetness and the fruityness diminished almost completely, leaving you with some muted honeydew volatiles. 

##**Recommended Percentage and Steep:**##

I would recommend 2-5% for standalone flavor and a short steep (overnight to 3 days).



##**Toxicity**##
Volatile | contains
---|---
Acetoin | 
Diacetyl |  
Acetyl Propionyl|  

##**Other:**##
TFA has Honeydew and Honeydew II flavoring. I suspect I tested the II version.

***

My testing setup:
Griffin RTA, Dual Kanthal Coils reading at 0.5, 30 Watts.

I make 3 10ml bottles (3mg nicotine, 50/50 PG VG) and steep them for 4 weeks. I test them after 1, 3, 7, 14, 21 and 28 days.
reviewsJson.author: SONDERvape
reviewsJson.title: Honeydew
